question: i have a mother and father that isn't in islam but i feel that they will like to know more but on the other hand I think that they will mess up my deen
answer:
QUESTION

1)I will like to know is there a hadith out there that says the best of man is those who have the most wives? If so was he PH SWS  talking about one man or all the man...  if so could you tell me why

2)Also i have a mother and father that isn't in islam but i feel that they will like to know more but on the other hand I think that they will mess up my deen can you help me and tell me the best way to help them?..

3)also can you tell me why the ph(sws) said that there will be more woman in hell then man and was he talking about this days or the days that  he was liveing.

4) what dose the name fawzan?

 5) soon insha i will be having a baby boy soon . but at 3 months they say they can hear the baby but in the Qur'an Allah says they the baby is alive at 4 month or (40days ) what is it that they hear.

 
ANSWER


Share:

1. We have thus far been unable to locate such a Hadith.

2. Our advise is that you first portray the beautiful characteristics of Islam to them. This could be done in your general interaction with them. This will gradually attract them towards Islam, Insha Allah. If they are awar of you being a Muslim at present, it would be easier. Also, constantly make du’aa for their Hidaayat.

3. Previously answered

4. Fawzaan means one who is successful.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best
